name: CVE-2017-8360
description: Conexant Systems mictray64 task, as used on HP Elite, EliteBook, ProBook, and ZBook systems, leaks sensitive data (keystrokes) to any process. In mictray64.exe (mic tray icon) 1.0.0.46, a LowLevelKeyboardProc Windows hook is used to capture keystrokes. This data is leaked via unintended channels: debug messages accessible to any process that is running in the current user session, and filesystem access to C:\Users\Public\MicTray.log by any process.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:conexant:mictray64:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_650_g2:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_755_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_850_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_470_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_745_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_430_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_820_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_446_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_folio_g1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_folio_1040_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:zbook_17_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_655_g2:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_450_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_840_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_848_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:zbook_15u_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elite_x2_1012_g1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_645_g2:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_828_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:zbook_15_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:zbook_studio_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_440_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_725_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:elitebook_1030_g1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_640_g2:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:hp:probook_455_g3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
